Class DiseaseInfo

java.lang.Object
DiseaseInfo
public final class DiseaseInfo extends Object
Data on the behaviour of the disease that strikes all cells apart from Creepers (immune)
Version:
2023.02.24
Author:
Ahmer Alam & Abu-Bakarr Jalloh

    • setAge

    • incrementAge

      public static void incrementAge()

    • getAge

      public static int getAge()
      Gets the age of the disease
      Returns:
      the number of generations the disease has lasted for

    • doImplementSymptom

      public static boolean doImplementSymptom()
      Checks whether all infected cells can transform from asymptomatic state -> symptomatic state
      Returns:
      true if the transformation is permitted

    • doDie

      public static boolean doDie()
      Checks whether or not the disease has ended
      Returns:
      true if the number of generations the disease has lasted for is larger than the set amount of generations the disease is meant to last for
